name: Symbol Swapper
description: Swap the selected symbols and/or symbol instances to another master, or swap entire libraries.
author: Jason Burns

commands.name: Symbol Swap Selections
commands.description: Swap the selected symbols and/or symbol instances to another master.

commands.name: Symbol Swap Libraries
commands.description: Swap all symbols from one library to another.

commands.name: Report Issue
commands.description: Report an issue with Symbol Swapper.

commands.name: Donate
commands.description: Donate to the development of Symbol Swapper.
